EmailTemplate.name: WBN-202202-EMP-CHBR-HWBR-Q3-NATIONAL-BROKER.Follow Up Non Attendee
EmailTemplate.subject: Recording now available from our recent webinar on expanding options through innovative solutions and paths to sell
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
WEBINAR
Expanding options for your clients through innovative solutions and paths to sell
Image African American woman on couch using tablet
We’re sorry you missed our recent webinar about innovative ways to sell our products. The good news is that we recorded the presentation and have it available for you to access anytime! Feel free to watch, share and let us know if you have any questions about our suite of virtual care solutions.
Watch the webinar <[[https://view.highspot.com/viewer/6331cea7f8d847fb79d8348b]]>
Watch the webinar and get ready for your selling season: Hear about the many expanded partnerships Teladoc Health has in place to bring virtual care to your clients Learn the new and innovative ways brokers are bringing Teladoc Health services to their clients through those partnerships Hear about the popular products and bundles—such as Chronic Condition Management—that brokers are using to help clients achieve and add value to their benefits strategies
About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
Unsubscribe <[[https://go1.teladochealth.com/subscriptions.html]]> | Privacy <[[https://teladochealth.com/privacy-policy/]]> | Legal Notice <[[https://teladochealth.com/notice-of-non-discrimination/]]>
